name: Mjolnir Reforged

[Thor's Fury]: deals extra True Dmg: (Atk ＋ M.Atk) x50% to the target, and causes damage of 50% Atk to at most 5 enemies around the target in a 5-meter range. There is a 20% chance for each target affected by [Thor's Fury] and spray damage to decrease the speed by 30%, This effect lasts 2 seconds.
